      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明

      Asynchronously executes the specified batch statement.
      static <T> AsyncExecutor AsyncExecutorProvider.getLocal(com.datastax.driver.core.Session session, AsyncResultHandler<T> handler)
      Returns a new AsyncExecutor per storm executor.

      Creates a new AsyncExecutor instance.
